headline: Data Acquisition System Company Evaluation Report 2025 | National Instruments, Keysight Technologies, and Spectris Lead with Innovative Platforms, Broad Industry Reach, and Strategic Expansion
summary: The Data Acquisition (DAQ) System Companies Quadrant provides a thorough analysis of the global DAQ market, offering key insights into leading companies, technological advances, and industry trends. The quadrant evaluates over 100 companies, recognizing the top 28 as leaders. DAQ systems, crucial for testing across sectors such as automotive and healthcare, have evolved to deliver precision and objective data collection.
